#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
  cin.tie(NULL);
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
  ll n,b; cin>>n;
  ll a[1000007]={0};
  for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
    cin>>b; a[b]++;
  }
  ll sum=0;
  for(int i=0;i<1000007;i++){
    if(a[i]>1){
      sum+=(1ll*a[i]*(a[i]-1))/2;
    }
  }
  cout<<(1ll*n*(n-1)/2)-sum<<"\n";
  return 0;
}
